certifications.title: Excellence in Data Structures in C++

projects.name: Senti-Media
projects.description: Designed an app to fetch and analyze comments from YouTube, Instagram Reels, and Facebook. Utilized advanced algorithms to predict sentiment percentages, showcasing expertise in data processing and trend analysis.

projects.name: Sports Celebrity Prediction
projects.description: Developed a project to identify and predict sports celebrities from their photos using Deep Learning Algorithms. Deployed the results on a web app to determine accuracy, aligning with the data analysis and prediction aspects of the internship.

projects.name: IPL Prediction
projects.description: Efficiently predicted winning teams in IPL matches based on historical data analysis. Utilized data from 2008 to 2020 to build a predictive model, showcasing data-driven decision-making skills.

experiences.description: Conducted comparative analysis of 4 segmentation methods to identify the most effective one. Implemented an automated process for threshold analysis, and out-of-time validation(OOTV), reducing time-to-market(TTM) by 40-50%.
Developing a text-to-speech system that converts written text into natural-sounding audio files for enhanced accessibility and user interaction.

Developed Isolation Forest models to analyze logs, resulting in a 40% reduction in false positive alerts, improving anomaly detection accuracy for enhanced cybersecurity measures. Analyzed tree-based and sequential patterns to identify anomalies, demonstrating analytical rigor.
Assisted 700+ students in Data Structures and Algorithms in C++. Utilized advanced DSA knowledge in C++ to enhance students learning experiences.
